Name: Dangerous Chris
About the game: Dangerous Chris is a 2D Top Down game with elements of action, exploration, shooter and adventure. In the game, you are Chris, a bitter man who had his family destroyed by a Chinese mobster leader. Chris, then, finding no other solution, seeks revenge, punishing those who caused him pain. The game contains several maps with varied gameplay. Some maps involving vehicle combat, distance combat, among other elements. It has a soundtrack by map, being inspired by the games of the 90s, such as Grand Theft Auto 2, among others.
